title: Marketing Intern
content:
About Us
Teads is a unique access point to the world's best publishers, enabling advertisers to reach 1.9 billion unique users every month, delivering engaging advertising experiences, tailored for mobile devices and ensuring the best combination of mass reach and brand safety.
Job Description
The Marketing Intern will support and develop all major marketing activities, including: digital communications, sales support, and events.
Responsibilities

Develop strategic marketing assets to support the sales team (case studies, sales presentations, one-pagers, newsletters, sales moments, etc.)
Translate strategic assets and product presentations from Italian to English and vice versa
Produce market analysis content
Support CRM strategy
Support social media management (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn)
Support the creation of print visibility opportunities, events, and email marketing activities

Requirements: Degrees/Work Experience/Languages

We will consider applications with work or education experience related to marketing/digital advertising with more attention.
Fluent in Italian, writing and speaking.
A good level of English, both written and spoken, is required.

 
Personal Requirements

You have a great passion for marketing and you know how to transmit your enthusiasm to the people around you.
You have good interpersonal skills.
You believe in collaboration and teamwork (also at an international level).
You are willing to accept new challenges and new goals on a daily basis to develop more specific skills.
You are a proactive communicator and you know how to work in multitasking.
You are an extroverted person and you do not fear confrontation.
You are an enterprising and dynamic person.

Technical Skills Required

Good knowledge of Microsoft Office suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc.)
Good knowledge of Google tools (Gmail, Drive, etc.)
Preferred knowledge of HubSpot and Salesforce

To Apply
Please be sure that you send your CV in English
About Teads
 Teads operates a leading, cloud-based, omnichannel platform that enables programmatic digital advertising across a global ecosystem of quality digital media.
As an end-to-end solution, Teads’ modular platform allows partners to leverage buy-side, sell-side, creative, data and AI optimization technologies. For advertisers and their agencies, Teads offers a single access point to buy the inventory of many of the world’s best publishers and content providers.
Through exclusive global media partnerships, Teads enables advertisers and agencies to reach billions of unique monthly users in brand safe, responsible advertising environments, while improving the effectiveness and efficiency of digital ad transactions.
Teads partners with the leading marketers, agencies and publishers through a team of 1,200+ people in 50 offices across more than 30 countries.
We're committed to creating a dynamic work environment that values diversity and inclusion, and represents employees across a variety of skill sets. We embrace contributions from all ages, sexes, races, ethnicities, religions, sexual orientations and gender identities.
